mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: Francis H. Pierpont Civil War Telegrams
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Anisansel, Henry to Pierpont, Francis Harrison
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Anisansel, Henry
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Gov Peirpoint [Francis H. Pierpont] Wheeling Feby 27 1862 By Telegraph from Paw Paw 27 1862 According to your request I will state that my trial began Monday last witnesses against me have been examined please send counsel immediately H. Anisansel Col 1st Va. Cavy 23w92col
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Anisansel, Henry
Paw Paw, (West) Virginia
Wheeling, (West) Virginia
Pierpont, Francis Harrison
